column2: "<%me>, you came at just the right time!"
"Um, there's something that I'd like you to help me investigate!"
"It seems these little guys have been worried about something around here."
"I don't exactly know what it is, but I can't sit around idly not knowing."
"I've been doing my best to look into it, but haven't found anything suspicious."
"That's why next time, I wanted to investigate the facility at the back of this area."
"Would you come with me? I'd go alone, I'm just not sure I could...."
